fields.description:
Hi @Appcelerator Team,

 I'm getting the below *socket hang up* error when i try to package the application for store submission with the following environments. Let me know if you need further informations


PS: I can build the app into Simulator with the same environment with out any issue, Only the problem while packaging iOS Adhoc/enterprise build. 
I know that 3.5.1 GA is old, But we want to upload one major release with this SDK for avoid the store app issue,
fields.summary: Unable to package the application to iOS Adhoc/Entertprise  with Ti SDK 3.5.1 GA
fields.environment:
7/12/2017, 6:34:58 PM
*Operating System*
Name = Mac OS X
Version = 10.10.3
Architecture = 64bit

    Node.js Version = 0.12.18
    npm Version = 2.15.11

    *Titanium CLI*
    CLI Version = 5.0.9

   * Titanium SDK*
    SDK Version = 3.5.1.GA

   * Target Platform* = iphone

  *   Xcode version* =  6.4

comments.body: Hello, whats your CLI version? SDK 3.5.1.GA is too old. Can you try logout and login back through terminal?
This error indicates an Apple submission error. Please try again in a few hours or contact Apple to fix their endpoints.
